column4: Hey People! How can I move+resize the partition I am using as / ? gparted wont let me when started while the partition is used. When I start Ubuntu from CD gparted is not installed. Should I use parted?
if you have the ubuntu live CD, it has gparted in the menus as 'Partition Editor'. There is also a gparted live CD which you can download.
drunken_sorteal: ah! didnt know i can install stuff on a livecd
